entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
